author: @andaluciainf
title: El Benfica supera al Estrella Roja en una noche histórica para Di María | Andalucía Información. Todas las noticias de Rota
text: El clan turco formado por Anatolly Trubin y Orkun Kokcu facilitó este jueves la puesta en escena del Benfica en la Liga de Campeones, y ya en el descanso, con los goles del dúo, encarriló su primera victoria, en Belgrado ante un Estrella Roja inferior y que solo reaccionó en el tramo final por el bajón de su rival impulsado por el gol del angoleño Milson. Duelo especial para el argentino Ángel di María, que se convirtió en el cuarto jugador en la historia en disputar quince ediciones de la Liga de Campeones. Dos excampeones de Europa coincidieron en el cara a cara de la primera fecha de la nueva competición. Son dos históricos aunque venidos a menos. De aquellos años de gloria, en 1991 para el Estrella Roja y mucho antes, en los 60, la entidad lisboeta, apenas el nombre. Especialmente para el club de Belgrado, relegado a la sombra del fútbol internacional. Al contrario de lo que sucede con el Estrella Roja, el Benfica mantiene el empeño en regresar a la primera línea continental, aunque hace tiempo que no realza su nombre porque se despide con premura de las eliminatorias cumbre. A pesar de ello, cuenta con jugadores de cierto renombre. El último, Ángel Di María, al que proyectó, joven, en sus inicios, antes de hacer carrera en los mejores clubes de Europa, como el Real Madrid, el Manchester United o el París Saint Germain. El argentino, de hecho, se convirtió en el cuarto jugador en la historia en disputar quince ediciones de la Liga de Campeones. Igualó a los brasileños Marcelo, del Real Madrid, y Fernandinho, pero aún está lejos de las diecinueve que jugó Leo Messi. El rosarino marcó la pauta y rompió el partido con un buen pase al danés Alexander Bah, que hizo un buen desmarque, llegó a la línea de fondo y centró al segundo palo donde entró Karem Akturkoglu que empujó el balón a la red al tiempo que aprovechaba la fragilidad del defensa bosnio Rade Krunic. En una acción aislada pudo igualar el Estrella Roja con un disparo potente de Bruno Duarte que paró el meta Anatolly Trubin. Y a la media hora llegó el segundo de los visitantes. En una estupenda falta directa, al borde del área, ejecutada por Orkun Kokcu que dejó sin reacción a Omri Glazer. El subcampeón portugués alcanzó el descanso con el triunfo encarrilado aunque Mirko Ivanic estuvo cerca de volver a meter en el partido al cuadro serbio con un tiro al borde del área algo desviado. Fue un anuncio de lo que ocurrió al inicio de la segunda mitad cuando el Benfica se relajó y el Estrella Roja creció. Sin acierto. Ni siquiera en un tiro, pasada la hora, de Nasser Djiga en un saque de esquina con el portero visitante batido. Tuvo suerte el cuadro lisboeta que perdió el control del partido. El decaimiento portugués fue alarmante, sin remedio. Y tras un disparo lejano de Di María que rozó el larguero el Estrella Roja consiguió su objetivo, resucitar sus opciones. Y acortó la distancia a cuatro del final, con un buen pase de Cherif Ndiaye hacia Milson, en el corazón del área, excesivamente solo. Se giró el angoleño y batió a Anatolly Trubin en su salida. El partido renació. No perdió tiempo Bruno Lage que tiró del banquillo para amarrar el marcador. Efrectuó un triple cambio con Leandro Barreiro, Zeki Amdouni y Jan Niklas Beste y retiró a Di María, a Kokcu y Pavlidis. Buscó la pausa ante la urgencia y la prisa local que - Ficha técnica: 1 - Estrella Roja: Omri Glazer; Ognjen Mimovic (Dalcio, m.27), Nasser Djiga, Uros Spajic, Seol Young-woo; Rade Krunić (Luka Ilic, m.82), Timi Elšnik, Silas Silas; Mirko Ivanic, Peter Olayinka (Milson, m.71) y Bruno Duarte (Cherif Ndiaye, m.71). 2 - Benfica: Anatolly Trubin; Alexander Bah (Issa Kaboré, m.37), Nicolas Otamendi, Antonio Silva, Álvaro Fernández; Angel Di María (Jan Niklas Beste, m.88), Orkun Kokcu (Leandro Barreiro, m.88), Florentino Luis, Kerem Akturkoglu; Vangelis Pavlidis (Zeki Amdouni, m.88) y Benjamin Rooheiser (Fredrik Aursnes, m.56). Goles: 0-1, m.9: Kerem Akturkoglu; 0-2, m.29. Orkun Kokcu. 1-2, m.86: Milson. Árbitro: Michael Oliver (ING). Mostró tarjeta amarilla a silas Silas y Young-Woo Seol, del Estrella Roja y a Álvaro Fernández y Fredrik Aursnes, del Benfica. Incidencias: encuentro de la primera jornada de la Fase Liga de la Liga de Campeones disputado en el estadio Rajko Milic de Belgrado. Envía tu noticia a: [participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)

author: 自由時報電子報
title: 大學繁星、申請放榜 斗六高中逾7成上國立大學8人錄取醫學領域
text:
大學繁星、申請放榜 斗六高中逾7成上國立大學8人錄取醫學領域
114學年度大學繁星、申請入學放榜，斗六高中表現亮眼，錄取國立頂尖大學較往年增加3成。（斗六高中提供）
〔記者黃淑莉／雲林報導〕114學年度大學繁星、個人申請入學今（12）日放榜，斗六高中表現優異，應屆畢業生逾7成錄取國立大學，另有8人錄取醫學、牙醫及中醫系。
學測滿60分滿級分的陳月恆成功上榜中國醫藥大學中醫學系，申請錄取4所醫學系的王博彥最終選擇成功大學醫學系，另6人分別錄取陽明交通大學醫學系、高雄醫學大學牙醫系、中國醫藥大學醫學系、中山醫學大學醫學系、輔仁大學醫學系等。
斗六高中代理校長鐘源旺表示，除了8名學生醫學、牙醫、中醫系金榜題名，今年逾7成錄取國立大學，其中台大、清華、陽明交大、成大、政大、中央、中正、中山、中興等頂尖國立大學的人數比去年成長3成。
校方指出，今年高分群學生中有部分選擇就業市場最夯的電機、光電、資工等學系，顯示學生對未來職業發展更有自己想法。

author: Estadão Conteúdo
title: Litoral de SP registra ventos de até 134km/h; chuvas devem seguir no fim de semana
text:
Litoral de SP registra ventos de até 134km/h; chuvas devem seguir no fim de semana
Ressaca marítima no litoral pode formar ondas de 2,5 a 3 metros nos próximos dias
A Defesa Civil de São Paulo emitiu alertas para expressivos volumes de chuva esperados para essa sexta-feira, 22. O órgão recomenda atenção para possíveis transtornos, em especial no litoral. Na última quinta-feira, 21, a região registrou ventos que chegaram a 134km/h, causando estragos com quedas de árvores e problemas no abastecimento de energia. Não foram registradas vítimas nas ocorrências, mas residências e veículos foram atingidos em cidades litorâneas.
- Santos: registrou a ventania mais forte da região, 134,5km/h. Um total de 25 árvores caíram, levando a interdição de vias e desvio do trânsito na cidade. Os bairros mais afetados foram Vila Mathias, Marapé e Embaré. Uma árvore atingiu um veículo que estava estacionado na Praça Miguel Couto, equipes da Defesa Civil municipal realizam a sinalização e o corte da árvore.
- Bertioga: houve queda de árvores na Rodovia Rio Santos e Mogi Bertioga;
- Peruíbe: 25 árvores caíram na cidade, parte das quedas aconteceram na Rodovia Coronel Rodolpho Pettená;
- Ilhabela: além da queda de árvores, as rajadas de vento provocaram pontos de alagamento. De acordo com a Defesa Civil municipal, houve a queda de uma árvore sobre uma residência, no bairro São Pedro, sem a necessidade de interdição do local. Ainda houve o registro de pontos de alagamento na Avenida São João e Rua Benedito Rosa de Jesus;
- São Sebastião: de acordo com a Defesa Civil municipal, houve uma queda de árvore sobre uma residência no bairro Camburi, o caso não mostrou necessidade de remoção da família. No bairro Boiçucanga, outra árvore atingiu o muro de uma residência. Na Vila Paraíso, uma árvore de grande porte caiu sobre a via, equipes da Defesa Civil municipal realizam a sinalização do local e o corte da árvore.
De acordo com dados divulgados pelo Centro de Gerenciamento de Emergência (CGE), há condições, nesse fim de semana, de chuvas fortes e contínuas, além das moderadas, acompanhadas de descargas elétricas e rajadas de vento que podem chegar até 88km. As previsões indicam ressaca marítima para todo litoral, com ondas de 2.5 a 3 metros, até domingo.
Segundo a Defesa Civil o destaque e atenção para as chuvas estão voltados para o Litoral Norte e Vale do Paraíba, onde os acumulados podem chegar a 250mm. Na Baixada Santista, chuvas devem chegar a 180mm.
"Não estão descartados risco para transtornos como: deslizamentos, inundações, alagamentos, enxurradas e raios. Portanto, destaca-se a importância de cuidado especial nas áreas mais vulneráveis", diz o alerta dvulgado pela Defesa Civil.

author: Radio Télévision Suisse
title: Les personnes actives de plus de 55 ans représentent moins de 10% des recrutements
text:
Si l'insertion des collaborateurs et collaboratrices plus âgés est bonne en Suisse en comparaison internationale, les personnes qui perdent leur emploi à plus de 55 ans rencontrent souvent des difficultés à retrouver un travail.
Lorsque l'âge de la retraite est passé, à 65 ans et plus, seulement 16% des employeurs sont clairement disposés à embaucher et 28% peuvent "plutôt l'envisager", relèvent les auteurs de l'étude.
En outre, lorsqu'on demande aux employeurs l'âge idéal de départ à la retraite pour les hommes, 46% d'entre eux indiquent un âge inférieur à 65 ans. Seuls 15% des employeurs interrogés situent l'âge idéal de départ à la retraite à 66 ans et plus. S'agissant des femmes, la majorité des employeurs (58%) estiment que l'âge idéal de la retraite est inférieur à 65 ans.
>> Lire aussi : [Dur dur de se faire embaucher après 60 ans, constate une étude ](https://www.rts.ch/info/economie/2024/article/dur-dur-de-se-faire-embaucher-apres-60-ans-constate-une-etude-28552619.html)
Faible volonté d'engagement
La moitié des entreprises relèvent que trouver du personnel qualifié est une tâche difficile. Pourtant, elles sont seulement 22% à considérer l'embauche de collaboratrices ou collaborateurs plus âgés comme une solution et 13% à encourager le travail au-delà de l'âge de la retraite.
Or, cette réserve de main-d'œuvre est considérable, dans la mesure où les personnes âgées de 55 à 70 ans représentent près d'un quart du potentiel de forces de travail disponible.
"Il est envisageable qu'à l'avenir, une aggravation de la pénurie de main-d'œuvre qualifiée en raison de la démographie dynamise le marché du travail des 55 ans et plus, et en particulier des 65 ans et plus, et que le potentiel de forces de travail correspondant soit davantage exploité", estime Andreas Christen, responsable de la recherche sur la prévoyance chez Swiss Life Suisse.
Les données sont tirées d'une enquête en ligne sur la base des réponses d'un millier de responsables des ressources humaines travaillant dans des entreprises employant au moins quatre personnes.
ats/iar

author: abdulkareem.aldaham
title: In Ghana, Sahel militants find refuge and supplies, sources say
text:
NAIROBI/ACCRA: Militants fighting in Burkina Faso are discreetly using Ghana’s north as a logistical and medical rear base to sustain their insurgency, seven sources told Reuters, a move that could help them expand their footprint in West Africa.
The sources, who include Ghanaian security officials and regional diplomats, said Ghanaian authorities appeared to be mostly turning a blind eye to the insurgents crossing over from neighboring Burkina Faso to stock up on food, fuel and even explosives, as well as getting injured fighters treated in hospital.
But they said that approach, while so far sparing Ghana from the kind of deadly attacks that have plagued its neighbors, risks allowing militants to put down roots in the country and recruit in some marginalized local communities.
Ghana shares a 600 km (372 mile) border with Burkina Faso, the country at the heart of an insurgency that has killed thousands, displaced millions and, according to some experts, turned the Sahel region into the epicenter of global terrorism as factions loyal to Al-Qaeda and Daesh expand their presence.
Burkina Faso has lost control of over half its territory as a pro-Al-Qaeda group known as JNIM gained ground. A JNIM leader this week told French broadcaster RFI that it was aiming to push into Ghana, Togo and Benin.
Unlike Benin and Togo, Ghana has not suffered a major attack.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 金融科技ETF华夏（516100）跌1.93%，半日成交额2383.24万元|金融科技_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，金融科技ETF华夏（516100）跌1.93%，报1.219元，成交额2383.24万元。金融科技ETF华夏（516100）重仓股方面， 同花顺 截止午盘跌2.55%， 东方财富 跌2.19%， 恒生电子 跌3.21%， 润和软件 跌1.81%， 新大陆 跌2.70%， 东华软件 跌0.66%， 指南针 跌2.21%， 广电运通 跌3.02%， 银之杰 跌2.09%， 赢时胜 跌2.30%。
金融科技ETF华夏（516100）业绩比较基准为中证金融科技主题指数收益率，管理人为华夏基金管理有限公司，基金经理为徐猛，成立（2021-07-13）以来回报为24.19%，近一个月回报为8.53%。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: newsdesk@nottinghampost.com (Oliver Pridmore)
title: Inside the major project bringing 'tens of thousands' of new jobs to the East Midlands
text: The man leading a project bringing tens of thousands of new jobs to the East Midlands says a "seamless transport network" is needed to make it a success. Improvements to the M1 and plans to extend Nottingham's tram network are among the initiatives which the East Midlands Freeport CEO says will be "really important" in making it work. The East Midlands is one of just eight areas across England that the Government has chosen to host a freeport, with the project estimated to bring in hundreds of millions of pounds to the region in the coming decades. The aim is that this money will be re-invested to tackle the "pockets of deprivation" that exist in Nottinghamshire, Derbyshire and Leicestershire. Having become operational in March, the East Midlands Freeport is already witnessing overseas businesses choosing to base themselves in the region. But Tom Newman-Taylor, the CEO of the Freeport, says further Government investment will be needed on top of the £25 million that has initially been secured for the project. Do you support plans to extend Nottingham's tram network? [Let us know here.](https://xd.wayin.com/display/container/dc/a84e9ea1-98c0-40d3-89fc-6959caea448a/entry) A freeport is a defined geographical area containing sites which can offer businesses major tax discounts compared to what they would normally be charged. The aim is to attract new investors into the UK and for high-quality jobs to follow, with the Freeport team already in constant dialogue with overseas businesses about basing themselves here. The East Midlands Freeport zone, the only inland freeport in the UK, contains three tax sites which are fixed and set out in law. They include its primary site at the East Midlands Airport and Gateway Cluster, land at [Ratcliffe-on-Soar](https://www.nottinghampost.com/news/local-news/new-plans-future-nottinghamshires-last-8770694) around the soon-to-be closed power station and the East Midlands Intermodal Park in Derbyshire, near Toyota's major manufacturing plant. Support given to companies who base themselves at these three sites will include relief from any business rates for five years, relief from having to pay National Insurance contributions for three years and no stamp duty being charged on the purchase of any land or property within the sites. Activity has already included parts of the SEGRO Logistics Park near the [East Midlands Airport,](https://www.nottinghampost.com/all-about/east-midlands-airport) a 700-acre development of logistics accommodation that gives businesses ranging from Amazon to DHL direct access to a rail freight terminal. But despite his belief in the potential of the East Midlands Freeport, Mr Newman-Taylor said: "In order to create those tens of thousands of jobs and bring in that investment, we need a seamless transport network. We need the M1 and the major road arteries to work effectively. "I'm talking to partners across the region about making sure that we shout with the loudest voice when it comes to securing that investment because that is a key part of making it a success. It is absolutely true that the East Midlands has received less than its fair share when it comes to Government investment. "Part of what we try to do, working with regional partners, it to shout as loudly as possible back into Government to say that in order to make this work, we need the investment." As well as improvements to major road networks, Mr Newman-Taylor said the idea of extending the NET network to the Ratcliffe-on-Soar tax site would boost connectivity. The successful Freeport bid at Ratcliffe runs in parallel to broader redevelopment plans for the site when the power station closes next September. Potential projects include gigafactories producing electric cars, a research and development centre partnered with a local university and a small scale hotel. Alongside these plans, site operator Uniper says it will aim to increase its capacity for hydrogen production to 500MW by the end of the decade. These clean energy developments could then be used to power the businesses that choose to base themselves at the Freeport site. Although hoping to see improvements in the transport network, the East Midlands Freeport CEO therefore believes that the region has the best of all the freeport propositions in the country. Mr Newman-Taylor said: "There's a really exciting proposition to build on in terms of being in the centre of the country, being connected by the UK's largest dedicated airfreight airport, our manufacturing heritage, our great cities and universities. "That said, there are pockets of deprivation, there are areas where we under-perform as a region in terms of skills and productivity. What the Freeport is about is attracting in that investment and addressing some of those long-standing issues." The development land contained within the East Midlands Freeport overall is equivalent to around 1,000 football pitches. The businesses that the Freeport team are particularly interested in attracting to the tax sites include those in logistics, advanced manufacturing and air cargo transportation. As well as the specific tax sites, any major company is able to come forward and apply to be a customs site. Although not accessing the same level of tax breaks as those on the three major East Midlands Freeport sites, those in the customs zones still benefit from simplified import procedures and the suspension of certain duties. The Freeport plans are also separate to the East Midlands being chosen as one of 12 locations to host an ['investment zone.'](https://www.nottinghampost.com/news/local-news/exciting-opportunity-more-jobs-east-8249637) These zones are similar in design to freeports, but there are differences in terms of location and the tax benefits to businesses. Mr Newman-Taylor says there is work to be done to bring all these schemes together in one simple package that can be used to attract international businesses to the East Midlands. Although the tax benefits offered by the Freeport are limited, the CEO says the lifespan of the project should be measurable in decades. The Freeport boss also says that the plans will allow the East Midlands to compete with countries such as the US when it comes to attracting major employers. Already, the development at the SEGRO Logistics Park represents hundreds of millions of pounds worth of investment, with the operator of the rail freight terminal there in the process of doubling capacity. Mr Newman-Taylor added: "By getting that investment in, the other thing that is not always that well understood is that we as a region get to keep hold of a big chunk of the tax uplift that would have gone back to the Treasury and Westminster. If we're doing our job correctly, we should be talking about extra hundreds of millions of pounds over the coming decades that we can then re-invest in the region."

author: www.yunnan.cn,云南日报报业集团,云南网
title: 曲靖会泽县宝云幼儿园开展萌娃生活技能比赛_云南看点_社会频道_云南网
text:
6月11日，会泽县宝云幼儿园精心组织了一场别开生面的“生活小能手，快乐显身手”生活技能比赛。全园800余名幼儿在这场趣味赛事中绽放光彩，生动诠释了宝云幼儿园“生活即教育”的特色教育理念。
比赛项目根据幼儿年龄特点和身心发展规律，分阶段、分层级开展，巧妙贴合幼儿成长需求。小班组的萌娃们专注于穿脱鞋子、穿脱袜子、玩具分类收纳等基础项目，在趣味游戏中夯实生活基础；中班组的宝贝们挑战穿脱外套、物品分类整理、叠被子等任务，培养有序生活的良好习惯；大班组的“小大人”则尝试使用筷子夹豆子、整理书包、整理床铺等更具难度的技能比拼，为幼小衔接做好充分准备。
这场充满童趣与挑战的生活技能比赛，在孩子们的欢声笑语中圆满落幕。此次比赛充分体现了宝幼儿园将生活教育融入日常的特色教学模式。未来，宝云幼儿园将继续深耕特色教育，深化家园合作，助力孩子们在“自己的事情自己做”中茁壮成长、。
云南网通讯员 马金友 吴思娴
